text: The Qoros 7 is a mid-size Crossover SUV made by Qoros. from 2020 to 2022. == History and Features == The Qoros 7 was first previewed by the MILE concept in the Auto Shanghai in 2019 in 2020 it made its debut at the Beijing Auto Show in the SUV is the first car from the brand under the control of Baoneng Investement Group and the Largest Qoros`s car. it uses a new expanded plataform from the Qoros 5 having a 1.6 liter and 1.8 both turbo petrol engines and a 7-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Qoros 7 was sold mainly in China during its production. == Discontinuation == The production of the Qoros 7 ended in 2022 mainly due to the discontinuation of the Qoros brand. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Qoros 7
